trans-unit.source: Provides data for a cancelable event.
trans-unit.target: 提供可取消事件的資料。

trans-unit.source: A cancelable event is raised when a component is about to perform an action that can be canceled, such as logging on to a Web site.
trans-unit.target: 當元件執行的動作，可以取消，例如登入網站時，會引發可取消事件。

trans-unit.source: The LoginCancelEventArgs class provides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to indicate whether the event should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: LoginCancelEventArgs 類別提供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性，指出是否應該取消事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: A LoginCancelEventArgs object is used with controls that have cancelable actions, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: LoginCancelEventArgs 物件搭配，具有可取消的動作，例如控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>控制項，而<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs"></xref> class with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs.Cancel*> property set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs"></xref>類別<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs.Cancel*>屬性設定為<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs.Cancel*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs"></xref> class with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs.Cancel*> property set to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs"></xref>類別<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs.Cancel*>屬性設定為指定的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs.Cancel*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to cancel the event; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要取消事件。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the event should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否應該取消事件。

trans-unit.source: You can use the Cancel property to indicate whether an event, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggingIn> event, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LoggingOut> event, or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangingPassword> event, should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 [取消] 屬性表示是否事件，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggingIn>事件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LoggingOut>事件，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangingPassword>應該取消事件，。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangingPassword> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginStatus.LoggingOut> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggingIn>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event should be canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果應該取消事件。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
